snippet: Prime Minister Vladimir V. Putin remains the most popular politician in the country, but his support has been increasingly defined by inertia among voters, a new survey shows.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Vladimir V. Putin remains the most popular politician in the country, but his support has been increasingly defined by inertia among voters, a new survey shows.

headline.main: Russians Shrug at Prospects of Another Putin Term, Poll Shows
headline.print_headline: Russians Shrug at Prospects of Another Putin Term, Poll Shows
headline.seo: Russians Shrug at Prospects of Long Putin Term, Poll Shows
